article_title: To Cut Healthcare Costs, Companies Find Safety In Numbers

article_metadata.description: Twenty of America's largest corporations recently formed a coalition to figure out what's working in health care -- and what's a waste of money. It's a worthwhile experiment since government has largely failed to rein in spiraling healthcare costs.
article_metadata.author: Sally Pipes
